attributes.action: support young people in setting up businesses whilst making use of empty shops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for those that believe the Prime Minister should support ( emotionally and financially) young people in starting up their own businesses, using up the empty shops that are currently an eye sore in town centres. This will enable them to get off the street and do something useful that benefits the whole community whilst they gain personal skills.
